components/common/responsive-img: {{!-- This file implements the lazysizes srcset pattern (as seen on https://github.com/aFarkas/lazysizes#modern-transparent-srcset-pattern) for maximum performance on modern browsers and reasonable compatibility with legacy browsers. There are a few important arguments to know about when using this component: `lazyload`: - If set to 'lazyload+lqip', will load a low-res image which will be replaced by lazysizes - ensuring that SOME content is shown immediately on page load. Without LQIP, a transparent gif will be used instead, which reduces the number of requests needed to load the page, making it even faster. - If set to 'lazyload', the browser will not load the full-size image at first, instead the lazysizes plugin will load it progressively after page load. This improves the load speed of the page, but it should be disabled for high-priority above-the-fold images. - If set to 'disabled', will not attempt to lazyload the image and instead tell the browser to load it immediately. Use this for high-priority images that are above the fold. `fallback_size`: This is the size to use for this image in legacy browsers that do not support srcset. Can be defined as a pixel bounding-box size (e.g. "123x123) or inherent width (e.g. "123w"). `class`: The CSS classes to add to the image, e.g. "card-image". If lazyloading is enabled, all images will have the "lazyload" class so that lazysizes will target them automatically. `otherAttributes`: Any other HTML attributes you want on the img tag, for example "height='100' width='100'" `default_image`: The default image to use if `image` is undefined or falsy. Should be a theme asset, usually defined as a relative path in the theme config. If a default image is not provided, you'll get an image tag with no image if the primary image is undefined. `lqip_size`: If you want to specify a particular size for the LQIP image, you can do so with this argument. A default of 80 pixels wide will be used otherwise. This argument has no effect if the lazyload mode is not "lazyload+lqip". --}}

{{#if settings.data_tag_enabled}}
{{else}}
{{#if sku '==' 'BUFR2715WH'}}
Promo

Get the Coolest Freezer You Can Ever Imagine with Beko’s 28” White Upright Freezer

Stock up on healthy food with Beko! Built to handle extreme heat and cold temperatures, this ENERGY STAR® Most Efficient freezer’s Freeze Guard technology ensures no loss of performance even when it is 5°F low or 109°F high outside. Finally, Beko’s Quick Freeze and frost-free technology make its way to this heavy-duty freezer.

{{else if sku '==' 'GTW720BSNWS'}}
Promo

GE Appliances is Here to Help You Tackle that Mountain of Muddy Jeans with its 4.8-cu ft. Top-Load Washer

Release your detergents and fabric conditioners at the right time with this washer’s FlexDispense mode for optimal cleaning. Also, with QuietWash, you can now enjoy a quieter wash and reduced vibration thanks to Dynamic Balancing Technology. Top off your laundry with Deep Rinse, Extra Rinse, and Warm Rinse cycle options.

{{else if sku '==' 'WA45T3200AW'}}
Promo

Fit More Laundry in a Single Load with Samsung’s Large 4.5 cu. ft. Capacity Top-Load Washer

Fewer loads mean less time in the laundry room and more time doing what you love – that’s what Samsung wants you to do. With advanced Self Clean, Vibration Reduction+, Soft-Close Lid, and Smart Care technologies, this top-load washer changes the way you do your laundry for good. And it’s always ready for delivery.

{{else if sku '==' 'DVE45T3200W'}}
Promo

Experience Powerful, Worry-Free Drying by Samsung’s 7.2 cu. ft. Electric Dryer with Sensor Dry

Featuring Samsung’s powerful Sensor Dry technology, this high-capacity dryer optimizes the time and temperature of your drying cycle for uncompromised protection of your clothes from heat damage. Its 8 preset drying cycles cover almost every drying need – from Quick Dry for light fabrics to Heavy Duty for jeans and blankets.

{{else if sku '==' 'WDT710PAHZ'}}
Promo

Clean Your Dishes in Half the Time with Whirlpool’s ENERGY STAR® Certified Dishwasher with Sensor Cycle

Be in control or let your built-in dishwasher pick the right cycle for you. Clean your after-party dishes with the 1-Hour Wash technology. Additional features are Soil Sensor which can detect how dirty your dishes are and adjust the Normal cycle as needed, and the handy Sensor Cycle which gets the right wash settings for each load.

{{else if sku '==' 'KDTE334GPS'}}
Promo

Equip Your Kitchen with a Modern, Stainless Steel Built-in Dishwasher by KitchenAid

The moment you laid your eyes on this 24-inch modern dishwasher, you’ll instantly fall in love with its exceptional features. Inside is a third-level rack that accommodates hard-to-place items. ProWash technology efficiently adjusts cleaning cycles in real-time while its PrintShield finish ensures smudge-free elegance for your kitchen.

{{else if sku '==' 'OLED77CXPUA'}}
Promo

Redefine Vision as LG OLED TV Brings You Its Class-Leading 77-inch 4K Smart TV

Why LG OLED? Because LG uses 8.3 million pixels to show you the most stunning clarity of life-like images right in your living room. With its AI-powered ecosystem, LG delivers smooth motion and over a billion rich colors and infinite contrast. Once you’ve seen this 77-inch OLED TV with your own eyes, you’ll definitely understand.

{{else if sku '==' 'OLED48CXPUB'}}
Promo

Get Yourself One of the World’s Most Intelligent TVs Made Beautifully by LG OLED TV with AI ThinQ®

Experience immersive visuals with LG’s 48-inch Smart OLED TV. LG ThinQ TVs are designed with built-in Google Assistant and Alexa, with full integration of the voice assistants you already use. Are you into gaming? Plug-and-play with NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility to take your gaming experience to new heights with LQ OLED TV.

{{else if sku '==' 'QN55Q70TAF'}}
Promo

Immerse Yourself in the Most Vivid World Created by Samsung’s QLED 4K Smart TV

Samsung continues its legacy of creating vivid worlds through its magnificent screens, and this TV brings it even closer to the masses. A smart processor enables you to capture over a billion colors in motion with Samsung’s Quantum Dot pixel arrangement. Its dual LED backlighting technology lets you adjust the color tone freely.

{{else if sku '==' 'QN82Q70TAFXZA'}}
Promo

Watch and Play Your Favorite Movies and Games in Immersive Quality with Samsung’s 82” Q70T 4K Smart TV

Burst through the most intense sequences without any hiccups as Samsung’s powerful visual processor delivers life-like images in stunning quality. Watch your movies in cutting-edge HDR resolution and be immersed with the Q70T’s near-theater 82” diagonal. With Samsung, the picture is so good it seems real.

{{else if sku '==' 'DW80R5060US'}}
Promo

Washing the Dishes Has Never Been this Elegant – Meet StormWash™ by Samsung

StormWash™ by Samsung is not your ordinary built-in dishwasher. Its powerful rotating spray jets clean your dishes at every angle for tough-to-reach spots. With an operational noise at only 48 dBA, you can now do silent washes for quieter kitchen. At the end of every cycle, StormWash™ automatically opens to circulate air for drying.

{{else if sku '==' 'QN65LST7TAF'}}
Promo

View the World in Stunning 4K Quality with Samsung’s 65-inch QLED UHD Smart TV with HDR

Four times the pixel, four times the clarity. Enjoy 4K resolution picture regardless of the source with Samsung’s AI-enabled upscaling. 4K AI automatically analyzes the input source to reduce image noise, restore lost details, and define edges around every object and text. That and over a billion shades of color will take your breath away.
